reviewText: This based-on-fact Lifetime TV movie, stars Poppy Montgomery as Generosa Ammon, a wealthy woman with two beautiful children who's married to a handsome and loving husband (David Sutcliffe).  She has everything a woman could want but she is compulsively determined to be dissatisfied and to make the people around her as unhappy as she is.When her husband asks for a divorce, he offers a settlement that would satisfy the needs of most small nations but Generosa thinks he's hiding money from her and wants to kill him.  Her lover and eventual husband is her contractor (Shawn Christian) a second rate criminal who gets carried away by having more money than he's ever dreamed of.Ultimately, the  situation is sad and unnecessary, leaving two small victims, the couple's children,  but nevertheless it is fascinating to watch, especially with Montgomery's very believable  performance as a greedy, selfish, and paranoid woman.
Title: Murder in the Hamptons

reviewText: This movie gives Shawn a chance to show what he can really do besides his roles in daytime soap operas. A good movie that will not disappoint.
summary: Shawn Christian is an underrated actor.
Title: Murder in the Hamptons

reviewText: I have watched this movie everytime it is on Lifetime channel.  I love the true crime movies: Betty Broderick, Murder in Greenwich, etc. I would, and have recommended this to many of my girlfriends and co-workers.  I have even bought this as a partial gift for girlfriends birthdays,and as  a just because, etc.
summary: Gotta love true crime stories on Lifetime!
Title: Murder in the Hamptons

reviewText: Rent this one, it was entertaining.  The acting was pretty good and the storyline didn't drag.  I like the mix with the people telling the story in the after fact mode and then letting it play out.  Well done and it would be a Lifetime winner for a Saturday or Sunday afternoon or weekday the kids are at school flick to watch.
Title: Murder in the Hamptons

reviewText: Shawn film again.  This was a true story and made it more interesting. This should have been promoted more as very good.
Title: Murder in the Hamptons

reviewText: Murder in the Hamptons," the story of a suave successful businessman and his exotic, adoring lover. From the outside, it sounds like a fairytale but behind closed doors, the marriage of Ted Ammon and Generosa Rand was beyond volatile. After the couple's ugly divorce, who would have thought the fallout would lead to murder?
Title: Murder in the Hamptons

reviewText: I really like the actor/actress that plays the Hamptons.  It keeps you very interested when watching it.  I like the ending where the boyfriend got his due.
Title: Murder in the Hamptons
